payload.name: side-channels-are-unavoidable-separate-secrets-by-isolation-class-and-hardware-domain
payload.title: Side channels are unavoidable; separate secrets by isolation class and hardware domain
payload.formal: timing/cache/power leak information even with perfect software.
payload.apm2_mapping: treat “secrets” and “high-risk workloads” as physically separate. Don’t put key material in the same host as adversarial workloads. In APM2 terms: capability minting, signing keys, and policy bundles must live in hardened enclaves/domains.
